from math import log2

def main():
    n,q = map(int,input().split())
    arr = list(map(int,input().split()))
    for _ in range(q):
        b = int(input())
        i = 0
        if b in arr:
            print(1)
            continue
        if b == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        if b%2 == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        while i < b and i < n:
            i += arr[i]
        if i == b:
            print(int(log2(b))+1)
        else:
            print(-1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
n, q = map(int, input().split())
coins = list(map(int, input().split()))
coins.sort()

for _ in range(q):
    a = int(input())
    res = 0
    while a > 0:
        if a in coins:
            res += 1
            break
        elif a % 2 == 0:
            a = a // 2
            res += 1
        else:
            res = -1
            break
    print(res)


def main():
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int,input().split()))

    arr.sort()
    print(arr)
    if arr[0] == arr[-1]:
        print(arr[0])
    else:
        print(-1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

    for _ in range(q):

        if b in arr:
            print(1)

            continue
        if b == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        #if b%2 == 1:

from math import log2


def main():
    n,q = map(int,input().split())
    arr = list(map(int,input().split()))
    for _ in range(q):
        b = int(input())
        i = 0
        if b in arr:
            print(1)
            continue
        if b == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        if b%2 == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        while i < b:
            i += arr[i]
        if i == b:
            print(int(log2(b))+1)
        else:
            print(-1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n, q = map(int, input().split())
coins = list(map(int, input().split()))
coins.sort()

for _ in range(q):
    a = int(input())
    res = 0
    while a > 0:
        if a % 2 == 0:
            a = a // 2
            res += 1
        elif a in coins:
            res += 1
            break
        else:
            res = -1
            break
    print(res)

def main():
    n, q = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for _ in range(q):
        b = int(input())
        i = 0
        if b in arr:
            print(1)
            continue
        if b == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        if b % 2 == 1:
            print(-1)
            continue
        while i < b and i < n:
            i += arr[i]
        if i == b:
            print(int(log2(b)) + 1)
        else:
            print(-1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
